Text.Page:
Galla's right about one thing: those hellhounds are a pain.

They jumped me—accursed pack tactics!—and I lost all the rations.

Talk about a nightmare assignment: "Hey, Eudon, how about you transport all this meat through hellhound country? Great! Good luck, buddy!" Sheesh.

If the goldmaw hellhounds haven't eaten it all, can you retrieve the rations for me, ?

We're starving, !

Let us at it!

And hey...how come it took you so long?
